description: Create, modify or delete a UserClass. If the UserClass name does not exist, the UserClass is created. If the UserClass has no relations, it is deleted.
availability: All users have access to this command. This command does not make sense if the executing account does not have any subusers.

paramaters.Definition: If set to 1: delete all existing relations
Adds a specific relation to the user class
Removes a specific relation from the user class
